welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bitton, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything our town has to offer during your stay. We hope you have a wonderful time here in Bitton!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Bristol Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yeovilton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Yeovilton Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upavon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upavon Airport is reserved for VIP and private charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
